cancelMatch(uint256).details: Only the creator can cancel if no one joined.

createMatch(address).details: Create a new match with a specific stake and referee.

emergencyClaim(uint256).details: Emergency reclaim if a match is stuck in Active status. Splits pool back to players.

joinMatch(uint256).details: Join a pending match by matching the stake.

settleMatch(uint256,address).details: Settle a match. Winnings are moved to pendingWithdrawals.
